text: Mtumwi amakhulupirira mu zimene zavumbulutsidwa kwa iye kuchokera kwa Ambuye wake, ndipo nawonso anthu okhulupirira amatero. Aliyense amakhulupirira mwa Mulungu, Angelo ake, mabuku ake ndi mwa Atumwi ake. Iwo amati “Ife sitisiyanitsa aliyense pakati pa Atumwi ake;” ndipo adati: “Ife tamva ndipo titsatira. Tipempha chikhulukiliro chanu Ambuye chifukwa ndi kwa inu kumene tidzabwerera.”
